name: Agent Reverb
description:
As Agent Reverb, you will use your GROOVE device to defeat dangerous magical creatures.

Part rhythm game and part idle/incremental game, with a story that progresses as you unlock new missions.

Tap your GROOVE device to the rhythm of the music to extract their magical energy. Use the collected energy to unlock upgrades, locations, and songs. Eventually, you'll have the ability to unlock robots to help collect energy even while you're playing a different mission. The numbers keep going up!

The game features original music in 10 missions designed to test your rhythmic ability. With 4 levels of difficulty, everyone should be able to find their GROOVE.

More missions and music are on the way!
